Author: needmoney
Title: [ANN] DARICO PREICO | Easy-access gateway to safer cryptocurrency investment
Body: YOUR EASY-ACCESS GATEWAY TO SAFER CRYPTOCURRENCY INVESTMENT  Website | Whitepaper | Twitter | Facebook | Blog | Bounty | Telegram   Darico is an asset-backed cryptocurrency of a new generation. A true pioneer and trailblazer, darico combines the benefits of bitcoinâ€™s growth potential and the security of gold. No other coin compares.  Darico is the ideal easy-access currency for aspiring crypto investors, offering the incredible potential of cryptocurrencies but hedged by the safety of gold.  See our explainer video here : What is Darico  Why Darico: Long-term investment security and asset diversification in one cryptocoin Reduces Volatility :The Darico Coin is backed with 35% solid gold held in custodial vaults. Gold has served as a reserve for thousands of years and holds the key to a more stable and safer cryptocurrency. Perfectly positioned to gain from todayâ€™s crypto boom : The Darico Coin is also backed by 55% Bitcoin and 10% Ether so it gains from the growth potential of two of the worldâ€™s most valued cryptocurrencies. Diversifies cryptocurrency portfolios : The Darico Coin has a low correlation with other crypto assets thanks to the unique structure of its asset basket. This makes it a safe, reliable, and attractive portfolio diversifier. Benefits from high liquidity : Gold is the most valued asset and Bitcoin and Ether are the most liquid cryptocurrencies. Merging these qualities gives Darico the best of both worlds in the form of stability, potential, and high liquidity.   How it works Daricoâ€™s 3 elements :A minimum of 90% of the total amount raised during the ICO will go towards buying the assets that will back the Darico Coin. As per the proportions of its asset basket, 55% of funding will convert to Bitcoin, 35% to gold, and 10% to ether. Auto mining : Through auto-mining, genesis accounts will emit new coins on a daily basis for 18 years until reaching a cap of 240 million. All Darico genesis account holders will share emissions based on current holdings. Ownership of genesis accounts and rights of future coins are transferable. Darico wallet : Darico provides an easy access to crypto trading for non-technical users. We developed an app wallet and a Darico debit card. With Darico, the possibilities for seamless transactions - on the web or off - and facilitating new kinds of investments are as infinite as they are exciting.

Author: Brothersav
Title: [ANN] DARICO PREICO | Easy-access gateway to safer cryptocurrency investment
Body: "Get it through bounty?" "Airdrop"? Nah mate. This coin is one that is not given away like other sh*tcoins. Darico is currently attempting to reach the masses; hence the reason for the fair but concise bounty program.  You will be rewarded with bonus DRC coins per each contribution you make via the bounty (i.e Adding your FB page, follow Telegram, post OC to forums and blogs such as Youtube and Reddit and Twitter..) Currently there's 12,000 DRC bonus tokens up for grabs, so do your part and spread the word!  This is not a P&D coin; Darico is backed by the ICO contributions to purchase 55% BTC, 10%ETH and 35% gold bullion held in vaults in Switzerland. (60 million coins will contributed to the ICO contributors; remaining coins to be burned),  You will need 1,000 DRC to be eligible for a Genesis Account at the current time, and currently (per Pre- ICO price) that's a USD4,600 buy in (10 ETH = 1000 DRC @ ETH USD$460) Genesis accounts will give you your constant PoS rewards eligible to be spent via debit card. In DRC coin, You will be eligible to claim such rewards at any time of day using their wallet. (It is best to claim reward in DRC every month- decrease cost in Gas).  If I have not convinced you, at least do some homework on the team. The CEO, Mojtaba Asadian, is a legend in the fiat economy, holding a Master's degree in Business Administration and Management, and has written two books influencing the investment world. Darico was the platinum sponsor at the recent #WBSDubai World Block Chain Summit, Dubai. Literally this coin is trying to gain momentum in UAE..  Both Ihor Pidruchny & Andrew Zubko are the blockchain architect and engineer, and are currently working on another successful company within the cryptosphere.  I'm going bullish. This coin is one of a kind backed by legends of the fiat and cryptospace.
